text: Helen Boughton-Leigh (January 15, 1906 – December 28, 1999) was an American alpine skier. She competed in the women's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1999 deaths Category:American female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Cleveland
title: Helen Boughton-Leigh
